subject: Theater
Baseball
lead_paragraph: Roger Guenveur Smith has incorporated the events of Aug. 22, 1965, when the Giants’ Juan Marichal clubbed Dodgers catcher John Roseboro with his bat, in a one-man show.
snippet: Roger Guenveur Smith has incorporated the events of Aug. 22, 1965, when the Giants’ Juan Marichal clubbed Dodgers catcher John Roseboro with his bat, in a one-man show.
